We circle the factory several times, noting the fences, woodland, cameras — everything.
Skirting the site on the bikes we’re hardly discrete. Five yellow Ducatis.
The factory looks impenetrable. Miles of all steel fencing, razor wire. Behind, a second tall fence, winding its way around the perimeter.
